scripts.migrate: export MIGRATE_TABLE=SequelizeMeta && export MIGRATE_DIR=migrations && node src/migrator.js up
scripts.migrate:down: export MIGRATE_TABLE=SequelizeMeta && export MIGRATE_DIR=migrations && node src/migrator.js down
scripts.migrate:next: export MIGRATE_TABLE=SequelizeMeta && export MIGRATE_DIR=migrations && node src/migrator.js next
scripts.reset:prev: export MIGRATE_TABLE=SequelizeMeta && export MIGRATE_DIR=migrations && node src/migrator.js prev
scripts.seeders: export MIGRATE_TABLE=sequelize_data && export MIGRATE_DIR=seeders && node src/migrator.js up
